criterion: Provides clear explanation of normal test results
Mentions the possibility of primary aldosteronism despite normal test results
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in the MyChart message
Does not include unnecessary or overly technical information
Advises considering medication adjustments for blood pressure management
Does not provide false or misleading information about primary aldosteronism
Does not neglect to include potential medication options for blood pressure management
Fails to mention the importance of regular blood pressure monitoring
Provides a clear and concise MyChart message
Does not provide conflicting information about medication options
